snippet.title: Cuisineer - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
See action-filled gameplay and cozy restaurant simulation in this trailer for Cuisineer, an upcoming action roguelite/cooking game. Delicious-looking dishes and more await in the trailer for Cuisineer, a wholesome food-focused game where you play as Pom, a young adventurer turned restaurateur. One day, you return to your hometown of Paell to manage your parents’ restaurant only to find it closed for business and deep in debt. The only way to pay your debt is to re-open the restaurant and make it thrive. And to do THAT you've got to go dungeon-delving!


Cuisineer will be available on PC on November 9, 2023.
